Package: org.ysb33r.groovy.dsl.vfs.impl

[Groovy] Class StandardFileSystemManager

      • org.ysb33r.groovy.dsl.vfs.impl.StandardFileSystemManager

      • A org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemManager that configures itself from an XML (Default: providers.xml) configuration file.
        Certain providers are only loaded and available if the dependent library is in your classpath. You have to configure your debugging facility to log "debug" messages to see if a provider was skipped due to "unresolved externals".
